name: Ocean acidification
description: Ocean acidification pressure scaled using biological thresholds
target: Aragonite saturation levels at 2.5 or higher
source_1: NOAA East Coast Ocean Acidification Product Suite

name: Sea level rise
description: Sea level rise pressure
target: Sea level rise smaller than 110% time the highest observed slr between 1993-2017

name: Sea surface temperature
description: Sea surface temperature anomalies
target: No anomalies in SST
source_1: Coral Reef Temperature Anomaly Database Version 6 (CoRTAD)

name: Pathogen-related beach closures
description: Proportion of swim season beaches are closed due to presence of pathogens
target: 100 days free of any beach closures, representing the average length of the swimming season for the region

name: Sediment quality index score
description: Sediment quality index
target: All monitoring sites classified as in “Good” sediment quality condition

name: Pounds per person
description: Pounds of trash collected per volunteer
target: Zero pounds of trash collected on all beaches on International Coastal Cleanup Day

name: Water quality index score
description: Water quality score
target: All monitoring sites classified as in “Good” water quality condition

name: GDP growth rate
description: GDP growth rate for coastal jobs
target: Annual growth in ocean related sectors’ GDP is at least 3%

name: Habitat weights
description: List of habitats in each region

name: Fishery catch data
description: rolling three year mean of commercial catch by state
target: NA

name: Stock scores
description: Fisheries stock scores between 0 and 1
target: B/Bmsy between 0.8 and 1.2, F/Fmsy between 0.66 and 1.2
source_1: National Marine Fisheries Service (via data request)

name: Water Quality Index score
description: Water Quality Index Score
target: Water Quality Index in all eelgrass beds is classified as “Good” by the EPA

name: Percent loss of habitat
description: Percent of habitat loss compared to historical values
target: No loss of salt marsh habitat from historical reference year (~1850’s)

name: SASI
description: SASI
target: No habitat disturbance from fishing effort across all seabed habitat types

name: Intertidal habitat destruction
description: Coastal population density (25 mi from shore) as a proxy for intertidal habitat destruction
target: No disturbance from large nearby populations

name: Carbon storage
description: Carbon storage score based on eelgrass and salt marsh
target: No loss of salt marsh habitat from historical reference year (~1850’s) and Water Quality Index in all eelgrass beds is classified as “Good” by the EPA

name: Coastal Protection
description: Coastal protection score based on eelgrass and salt marsh
target: No loss of salt marsh habitat from historical reference year (~1850’s) and Water Quality Index in all eelgrass beds is classified as “Good” by the EPA

name: Conservation status
description: Conservation status from IUCN or Natureserve per region
target: No marine species are at risk of extinction and all are classified as of Least Concern using The International Union for Conservation of Nature’s (IUCN) Red List of Threatened Species criteria

name: wage growth rate
description: growth rate in wages compared to the average of the previous 3 years
target: Ocean related sectors’ wages are growing at least 3.5% per year in accordance with the Nominal Wage Growth Target set by the US Federal Reserve

name: job growth wate
description: growth rate of jobs compared to the average of the previous 3 years
target: Annual job growth in ocean related sectors is equal to or greater than the national annual average job growth

name: Inland coastal protected areas
description: Proportion of 1km inland area protected
target: 17% of coastal land (1km from coast) protected (Aichi target)

name: Offshore coastal protected areas
description: Proportion of state waters protected
target: 10% of coastal waters protected (Aichi target)

name: Tonnes of production
description: Tonnes of production with a 3 yr rolling average
target: Growth in production of 4% annually
source_1: Put together by hand from available state and agency reports

name: Seafood Watch sustainability scores
description: Seafood watch sustainability scores
target: NA

name: Fishing pressure
description: Pressure from fishing biomass removal
target: Catch is less than the 99% quantile observed between 1950-2015
source_1: Watson, R. A. and Tidd, A. 2018

name: Pathogen pollution
description: Percent of year with beaches closed due to presence of pathogens

name: SASI
description: SASI

name: Socal pressure
description: Social pressure derived from NOAAs social vulnerability index, Opportunity Index, State Competiveness Report, and the LCV Scorecards

name: Sediment quality index
description: Water quality score

name: Beach trash
description: Trash picked up during coastal cleanup day

name: Water quality index
description: Water quality score

name: Habitat destruction
description: Habitat destruction and pollution from aquaculture

name: Mariculture disease
description: Introduction of disease from farmed species

name: Gas prices to wage ratio
description: Comparison of gas prices to mean wages
target: Maintain a constant ratio year over year. No change, or a negative change indicating increased economic access, results in a perfect score. If the ratio doubles, the region scores 0.
source_1: US Energy Information Administration US Bureau of Labor Statistics

name: Fish stock sustainability
description: NOAA's fish stock sustainability index
target: All stocks receive an FSSI score of 4

name: Species pollution resilience
description: Existence, implementation/enforcemnet, and compliance/effectiveness of regulations to counteract species pollution

name: Climate change resilience
description: Existence, implementation/enforcemnet, and compliance/effectiveness of regulations to counteract climate change
source_1: American Council for Energy-Efficient Economy Scorecards

name: Species status
description: Species status as calculated in the SPP goal but used as a measure of ecological resilience

name: Fishing pressure resilience
description: Existence, implementation/enforcemnet, and compliance/effectiveness of regulations to counteract fishing pressure
source_1: National Marine Fisheries Service (via data request)
source_5: NOAA Office of Law Enforcement (requested data)

name: Habitat destruction resilience
description: Existence, implementation/enforcemnet, and compliance/effectiveness of regulations to counteract habitat destruction
source_3_url: NOAA Office of Law Enforcement (requested data)

name: Social resilience
description: Social resilience derived from NOAAs social vulnerability index, Opportunity Index, State Competiveness Report, and the LCV Scorecards

name: Water pollution resilience
description: Existence, implementation/enforcemnet, and compliance/effectiveness of regulations to counteract water pollution

name: Region areas based on EEZ boundaries
description: Area of Ocean Health Index regions modified from exclusive economic zones

name: OHI regions
description: Subset of regions that are not deleted or disputed

name: Regions
description: Regions by type (eez, subocean, unclaimed)

name: Nonindigenous species
description: Measure of harmful invasive species

name: Genetic escapes
description: Introduced mariculture species as a proxy for genetic escapes

name: Region id where species exist
description: region id where species is found

name: Species conservation status score
description: Species conservation status score based on IUCN and NatureServe
target: No marine species are at risk of extinction and all are classified as of Least Concern using The International Union for Conservation of Nature’s (IUCN) Red List of Threatened Species criteria

name: species trends
description: species population trends

name: Proportion of swim season beaches are open on average
description: Proportion of swim season beaches are open on average
target: At least 100 days free of any beach closures, representing the average length of the swimming season for the region

name: job growth rate
description: Job growth rate in T&R sector compared to avg of previous 3 years
target: Annual job growth in ocean related sectors is equal to or greater than the national annual average job growth

name: proportion of coast with an access point
description: proportion of coast with an access point
target: At least one access point every mile of coastline

name: Commercial fishing engagement
target: 10% higher than the highest regional level

name: Recreational fishing reliance
target: 10% higher than the highest regional level

name: Coastal hardening
description: Proportion of coast that has been armored
target: None of the coastline is armored
